H0.text: In which Lake District town would you find the Cumberland Pencil Museum. Ambleside

H1.text: In which Lake District town would you find the Cumberland Pencil Museum. Windermere

H2.text: In which Lake District town would you find the Cumberland Pencil Museum. Grasmere

H3.text: In which Lake District town would you find the Cumberland Pencil Museum. KESWICK

A4.text: The Derwent Pencil Museum is located in Keswick, in the north-west of England.

A5.text: The first pencil factory, owned by the Cumberland Pencil Company, opened in Keswick in 1832.
